EmailTemplate.subject: The ADS-B Out STC for Your Aircraft is Here
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com]]> <[[http://prostaraviation.com/]]> Facebook <[[https://www.facebook.com/HoneywellAero]]> LinkedIn <[[https://www.linkedin.com/company/honeywell-aerospace]]> Twitter <[[https://twitter.com/Honeywell_Aero?ref_src=twsrc%5Egoogle%7Ctwcamp%5Eserp%7Ctwgr%5Eauthor]]> YouTube <[[https://www.youtube.com/user/HoneywellAviation]]> Facebook <[[https://www.facebook.com/Pro-Star-Aviation-LLC-181065918611760/]]> LinkedIn <[[https://www.linkedin.com/company/pro-star-aviation]]> Twitter <[[https://twitter.com/prostaraviation]]> YouTube <[[https://www.youtube.com/user/ProStarAviation]]> The ADS-B Out STC for Your Aircraft by Pro Star Aviation and Honeywell
Pro Star Aviation's ADS-B Out STC Did you know that only 1 in 10 operators have yet to find a solution for their aircraft to meet the January 1, 2020 ADS-B Out deadline? Fortunately, with Pro Star Aviation’s ADS-B Out approved maintenance list STC for your aircraft featuring Honeywell's Primus® II Radio System, you can ensure your travel plans in 2020.
Pro Star Aviation's ADS-B Out AML STC covers:
- Bombardier Global Express - Bombardier Challenger 601 - Bombardier Learjet 40 & 45 - Cessna Citation 550, 560, 650 & 750 - Hawker 800 & 1,000
Honeywell's Primus II Radio System When you upgrade your existing Honeywell Primus II Radio and add a stand-alone GPS receiver, you’ll enjoy a cost-effective solution combined with the latest configuration to meet the ADS-B Out mandate. Fly with confidence with Honeywell's Primus II Radio equipped with a Mode S Transponder and receive:
- Increased aircraft positioning accuracy with full, WAAS capability
- Reduced separation and highly accurate departure and arrival times
- Surveillance in areas that do not currently have radar coverage
- A clear view of vehicles and runways in order to avoid collisions or delays
- More efficient spacing and optimal routing in non-radar environments
ADS-B Out Resources In just a few short weeks, you’ll receive more information about the STC, the solutions offered and how Pro Star Aviation can equip your aircraft with a solution to comply with the ADS-B Out mandate in 2020. Avoid delays and learn more about the ADS-B Out deadline to see how Honeywell's integrated solutions can help:
- The Ins and Outs of ADS-B DO-260B Compliance <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/news-listing/2015/october/the-ins-and-outs-of-the-ads-b-do-260b-compliance]]>
- The ADS-B Mandate: What You Need to Know <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/news-listing/2015/february/mandates-automatic-dependent-surveillance-broadcast]]>
- The ADS-B Deep Dive <[[https://www.mygdc.com/assets/public_files/gdc_services/pilot_services/presentations/ADS_B_Deep_Dive.pdf]]>
Pro Star Aviation Based in the Northeast United States, Pro Star Aviation is an FAA Part 145 Repair Station specializing in business and corporate aircraft. Capabilities include; aircraft maintenance, engine service, avionics repair and service, avionics installations, structural modifications and STC development service. Our company specializes in the following; Special Missions/ALE projects, Cabin Entertainment systems, Avionics Installations, Engineering and STC ODA & DER services. Privacy Statement <[[http://honeywell.com/Privacy]]> © 2016 Honeywell International Inc. <[[http://www.honeywell.com]]> Terms & Conditions <[[http://honeywell.com/Pages/TermsConditions.aspx]]>
